roleset.name: exchange one thing for another
roleset.note: SWAP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swap' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 13.6, no other framed members listed. Framenet entry Replacement. Comparison with exchange. (from swap.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: other item in exchange, price, or premium; traded for or at

example.name: most typical usage
example.text: [The bank]-1 has a 45% reserve against the remaining C$349 million of Mexican debt and expects *trace*-1 to swap that for other Mexican notes supported by U.S. Treasury zero-coupon bonds.
example.arg: for other Mexican notes supported by U.S. Treasury zero-coupon bonds

example.name: with another exchanger
example.text: Mary swapped germs with John last night.
